verses.verse: "As for you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword;<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> and <S%H5674>use<s%> it [as] a barber's <S%H8593>razor<s%> on your <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H2206>beard.<s%> Then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3976>scales<s%> for <S%H4948>weighing<s%> and <S%H2505>divide<s%> the hair.

<S%H7992>"One<s%> <S%H7992>third<s%> you shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> in the <S%H217>fire<s%> at the <S%H8432>center<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4692>siege<s%> are <S%H4390>completed.<s%> Then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H7992>one<s%> <S%H7992>third<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> [it] with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the city, and <S%H7992>one<s%> <S%H7992>third<s%> you shall <S%H2219>scatter<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind;<s%> and I will <S%H9553>unsheathe<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them.
<S%H3947>"Take<s%> also a <S%H4592>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%> from them and <S%H6696>bind<s%> them in the <S%H3671>edges<s%> of your [robes.]

"And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of them and <S%H7993>throw<s%> them into the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> them in the <S%H784>fire;<s%> from it a <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H3318>spread<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H384>'This<s%> is <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> I have <S%H7760>set<s%> her at the <S%H8432>center<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> with <S%H776>lands<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> her.

'But she has <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H7564>wickedly<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H854>against<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H776>lands<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> her; for they have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and have not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> you have <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H9098>turmoil<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> you, and have not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>observed<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>observed<s%> the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> you,'

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I, <S%H1571>even<s%> I, am <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

'And <S%H3282>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> among you <S%H834>what<s%> I have not <S%H6213>done,<s%> and the <S%H3644>like<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5750>again.<s%>

<S%H3651>'Therefore,<s%> fathers will <S%H1>eat<s%> [their] <S%H398>sons<s%> <S%H1121>among<s%> you, and <S%H8432>sons<s%> will <S%H1121>eat<s%> their fathers; for I will <S%H398>execute<s%> <S%H1>judgments<s%> on you, and <S%H6213>scatter<s%> <S%H8201>all<s%> your <S%H2219>remnant<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7611>wind.<s%>

<S%H3651>'So<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H518>'surely,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> you have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>idols<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> therefore I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1639>withdraw,<s%> and My <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H2347>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2347>pity<s%> and I will not <S%H2550>spare.<s%>

<S%H7992>'One<s%> <S%H7992>third<s%> of you will <S%H4191>die<s%> by <S%H1698>plague<s%> or be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> by <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, <S%H7992>one<s%> <S%H7992>third<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> you, and <S%H7992>one<s%> <S%H7992>third<s%> I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and I will <S%H9553>unsheathe<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them.

'Thus My <S%H639>anger<s%> will be <S%H3615>spent,<s%> and I will <S%H5117>satisfy<s%> My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on them, and I shall be <S%H5162>appeased;<s%> then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in My <S%H7068>zeal<s%> when I have <S%H3615>spent<s%> My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon them.

'Moreover, I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H2723>desolation<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> you, in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H5674>pass<s%> by.

'So it will be a <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> a <S%H1422>reviling,<s%> a <S%H4148>warning<s%> and an <S%H4923>object<s%> of <S%H4923>horror<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> you, when I <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> against you in <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and <S%H2534>raging<s%> <S%H9640>rebukes.<s%> I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

'When I <S%H7971>send<s%> against them the <S%H7451>deadly<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were for the <S%H7843>destruction<s%> of those <S%H834>whom<s%> I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> you, then I shall also <S%H3254>intensify<s%> the <S%H7458>famine<s%> upon you, and <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

'Moreover, I will <S%H7971>send<s%> on you <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H7451>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beasts,<s%> and they will <S%H7921>bereave<s%> you of <S%H7921>children;<s%> <S%H1698>plague<s%> and <S%H1818>bloodshed<s%> also will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through you, and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> on you. I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>' "
